description: This file defines a class `SentenceTransformerReranker` that uses the `sentence_transformers` library to rerank a list of Document objects based on their similarity to a query, utilizing a CrossEncoder model.

classes.name: SentenceTransformerReranker
classes.description: A reranker class that uses a sentence transformer CrossEncoder model to score and rank documents based on their relevance to a query.

methods.name: _rerank
methods.description: Internal method that performs the reranking of documents based on similarity scores computed by the CrossEncoder model.

methods.name: rerank
methods.description: Public method that wraps `_rerank` with exception handling, returning original documents if an error occurs.
